nodes.text: Myto's Arrow was a hyperlane located in the Outer Rim. It was discovered by its namesake, Galactic Republic scout Keos Myto. The route connected Dantooine, located in the Raioballo sector, with the Obtrexta sector. In the years following the Battle of Endor, part of this route was under the authority of the Pentastar Alignment. They allowed the Karazak Slavers Cooperative to operate on and around Gabredor III, one of the planets in their section of the route.
